scripts.pubstatic: cd .. && rsync -a --omit-dir-times --no-perms --exclude node_modules --exclude .git --exclude public/generated/ --exclude bin/cache static-rss/ demo@roadtolarissa.com:static-rss/
scripts.pubnyc: cd .. && rsync -a --omit-dir-times --no-perms --exclude node_modules --exclude .git --exclude public/generated/ --exclude bin/cache static-rss/ demo@roadtolarissa.com:feed-nyc/
scripts.favicons: node bin/download.js && node bin/parse.js && node bin/archive.js && node bin/favicons.js
